summary: Ruled by King Augustin, Carpia is a peaceful kingdom in a world inhabited by dragons and knights. The land's serenity is unexpectedly shattered by a Fire Dragon that spreads almighty fear and death amongst the kingdom's innocent people.
cast: Amy Acker|Tom Wisdom|John Rhys-Davies|Arnold Vosloo|Razvan Vasilescu|Oana Pellea|Cabral Ibacka|Ovidiu Niculescu|Loredana Groza|Cristian Motiu|Sorin Gordi|Denisa Rosca|Roxanna Ravenor Yamamoto
title: Fire & Ice
